original_text: People are standing on the roofs of their houses. They are standing in the streets. They are all crying and weeping. They are sad because I have destroyed Moab. I have broken it in pieces, like a jar that I no longer want.’ That is what the Lord says. People are standing on the roofs of their houses. They are standing in the streets. They are all crying and weeping. They are sad because I have destroyed Moab. I have broken it in pieces, like a jar that I no longer want.’ That is what the Lord says. People are standing on the roofs of their houses.
korean_text: 모압의 모든 지붕과 거리 각처에서 슬피 우는 소리가 들리니 내가 모압을 마음에 들지 않는 그릇 같이 깨뜨렸음이라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: People are standing on the roofs of their houses.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 자기 집 지붕 위에 서 있다.

sentences.original_text: They are standing in the streets.
They are all crying and weeping.
They are sad because I have destroyed Moab.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 모압을 멸망시켰기 때문에 그들은 슬퍼한다.

sentences.original_text: I have broken it in pieces, like a jar that I no longer want.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 더 이상 원하지 않는 항아리처럼 그것을 조각내었다.

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says.
People are standing on the roofs of their houses.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 자기 집 지붕 위에 서 있다.

sentences.original_text: They are standing in the streets.
They are all crying and weeping.
They are sad because I have destroyed Moab.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 모압을 멸망시켰기 때문에 그들은 슬퍼한다.

sentences.original_text: I have broken it in pieces, like a jar that I no longer want.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 더 이상 원하지 않는 항아리처럼 그것을 조각내었다.

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says.
People are standing on the roofs of their houses.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 자기 집 지붕 위에 서 있다.
